page.title: 20INTERESTING PEOPLE
page.content: There are living in Constable Burton two ladies who are as old as the century.They have lived through many reigns and seen many changes.Both can remember the time when almost everyone who lived in the village worked for the estate,carpenters, woodmen,lime-makers and blacksmiths. One of the ladies, Miss Lambert,used to teach at the school.She remembers the children of earlier times who walked long distances to school,or who came by train.Now when she comes to school,she recognises present-day children by their likeness to their parents.Her work for the church,where she plays the organ,and for the village was rewarded recently when she was presented with the Maundy Money at Ripon by the Queen. The other lady,Mrs Middleton,still runs the village shop.
